experience.title: Experience
experience.subtitle: Professional journey in innovative companies, from frontend development to scalable full-stack architectures.

morseVerse.title: Co-Founder & Full Stack Developer
responsibilities: Develop using Python, Next.js, React, and TypeScript, ensuring clean and scalable code.
Contribute to design and functionality decisions, improving user experience.
Organize architecture and project structures, ensuring maintainability and scalability.
Collaborate on database and API integrations, optimizing frontend-backend communication.

intelligentApps.title: Full Stack Developer
responsibilities: Built full-stack applications using React, Next.js, Node.js, and PostgreSQL.
Integrated AI features using OpenAI APIs (generative descriptions, smart filters).
Developed REST and GraphQL APIs with Prisma ORM and strong validation layers.
Participated in designing scalable architectures with microservices.
Implemented automated testing (unit and integration).
Used TypeScript and Tailwind CSS across the stack for consistency and productivity.
Deployed apps with Docker and CI/CD pipelines on Linux servers (Vercel and VPS).

freelance.title: Full Stack Developer
responsibilities: Designed and developed custom web platforms for startups and small businesses.
Built full-stack solutions using React, Node.js, MySQL, and Sequelize.
Created RESTful APIs and reusable components with Tailwind and TypeScript.
Handled deployment and maintenance on Linux servers using Git and VPS.
Led technical planning and architecture with clients.

digitalInnovators.title: Front End Developer
responsibilities: Built and maintained SPAs using React and Redux.
Increased user retention by 15% and improved conversion rates by 20%.
Contributed to an internal component library, reducing development time by 30%.
Developed custom React hooks to enhance code modularity.
